thread.title: 10Best: Vote for your Caribbean favorites!

title: 10Best: Vote for your Caribbean favorites!
text:
Vote for your Caribbean favorites now through November 9. (Photo: gmg9130, Getty Images/iStockphoto)
13 CONNECT 32 TWEET 3 LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE There's more to the Caribbean than palm-lined beaches, white sand and turquoise water (though we love those things too). USA TODAY 10Best teamed up with a panel of Caribbean travel experts to select 20 places as nominees in the categories of Best Caribbean Destination for Food, Best Caribbean Destination for Adventure, Best Caribbean Destination for Shopping, Best Caribbean Destination for Nightlife and Best Caribbean Destination for Golf. Now we need your help naming the best in each category. Vote for your favorites once per day until polls close on Monday, November 9 at noon ET.
Click on each category to vote, or visit 10Best.com . The nominees in each Caribbean category are as follows:
Best Caribbean Destination for Adventure
Which destination in the Caribbean has the best outdoor adventures? Vote now! (Photo: Thinkstock)
Ambergris Caye, Belize
Andros, Bahamas
Barbados
Bonaire
Caicos Islands, Turks & Caicos
Cozumel, Mexico
Dominica
Dominican Republic
Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands
Haiti
Jamaica
Nassau Paradise Island, Bahamas
Puerto Rico Island, Puerto Rico
Saba
St. Croix, U.S. Virgin Islands
St. John, U.S. Virgin Islands
St. Kitts
Tobago, Trinidad & Tobago
Tortola, British Virgin Islands
Vieques, Puerto Rico

Vote for your favorite foodie destination in the Caribbean. (Photo: Thinkstock)
